observation_location.full: ERC, Clarkson Campus, Potsdam, New York

current_observation.observation_time: Last Updated on April 1, 7:15 AM EDT

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will change to some rain showers as the day wears on. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 12C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 32F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 42F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 6C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
